mdRecord.dcterms:title: General Henri Joseph Gouraud laying a wreath at Washington's tomb, June 6, 1923
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: National Photo Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photographic print [press photo] of General Henri Joseph Gouraud laying a wreath at Washington's tomb. Mount Vernon Resident Superintendent Harrison Dodge is nearby at left side of the photograph (in civilian attire) and tomb guard Charles Simms stands at the far right. An unidentified man in uniform is at the far left edge of the photograph.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Washington, George, 1732-1799 -- Tomb
